summary: Most core pages and routing are implemented (Home, About, Menu, Offers, Gallery, Contact) with a sticky responsive header, shared footer layout, and per-page SEO via a `Seo` component. However, the diff does not provide evidence of the static PDF asset required for menu download, and the Gallery implementation appears to omit the required “family seating” theme/images. There are also additional authentication/backend scaffolding pieces not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide a prominent “Download Menu (PDF)” button that downloads a static PDF file shipped with the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The Menu page opens `/assets/menu.pdf`, but the diff summary does not show any added static PDF asset at that path (or similar), so the download target may not exist in the shipped frontend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Gallery page must showcase imagery across three themes: food, ambience, and family seating.
missing_requirements.reason: The Gallery page data structure includes `food` and `ambience` only; no `family seating` theme/category or images are shown in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider scaffolding and actor creation hooks (React Query + actor management) despite the site being a marketing website with no requested authentication features.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for login/auth or actor hooks; non-goals explicitly exclude an authenticated admin/dashboard. The diff adds II context/provider and actor hooks anyway.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty backend canister (`actor {}`) even though requirements are frontend-only for a marketing site and no backend behavior is specified.
hallucinated_features.reason: No backend functionality is requested; the backend file adds a canister with no methods.
